\Aura\DiForge

Creates objects using reflection and the specified configuration values.

todo

newInstance()

newInstance(string $class, array $merge_params, array $merge_setter) : object

Creates and returns a new instance of a class using reflection and the configuration parameters, optionally with overrides, invoking Lazy values along the way.

Parameters

string $class

The class to instantiate.
array $merge_params

An array of override parameters; the key may be the name or the numeric position of the constructor parameter, and the value is the parameter value to use.
array $merge_setter

An array of override setters; the key is the name of the setter method to call and the value is the value to be passed to the setter method.

Returns

object

Tags

todo

mergeParams()

mergeParams(array $params, array $merge_params) : array

Returns the params after merging with overides; also invokes Lazy param values.

Parameters

array $params

The constructor parameters.
array $merge_params

An array of override parameters; the key may be the name or the numeric position of the constructor parameter, and the value is the parameter value to use.

Returns

array
